full_title: Poor People's Day by Bigg Jus
name: Poor People’s Day

song.full_title: Everything Must Coincide by Bigg Jus
song.title: Everything Must Coincide
Supa Nigga
song.lyrics:
Supa Nigga Lyrics[Intro]
TNS
The new and improved
The new fangled monochromatic Steppin Fetchit in high definition
He's Ben Vereen Bojangles tap-dancin in this

[Verse 1]
Ten million chameleons and all of them gray
For the mind state is that of cubical space
Thinking of these verses as a thought grenade or worst case scenario a disintegration ray
Your pumping heart becomes the blank canvas
Whether we paint pretty pictures of flowers or a masterpiece of epic anguish
For my tour de force I downstroy your sign language
Make the sign of a fist and punch you square in your cabbage
Look around Dorothy you done missed your exit
We past Kansas
This be South West Atlanta
Where they run the West Cost offense with killa running backs and a flotilla of Bela Lugosis
In the back safety
It ain't safe see
So hide behind your most trusted reinforcements
My squad of stampeding elephants hit the record store
Samples scream for they life as if we was Lizzie Borden
Knowing full well they get chopped up in the morning and served with tea and crumpets
For in life you either a big game safari hunter or cute furry hunted
Forget the hardest thug ass rapper
I make nerdy suburban MCs be on some gun shit
Mad as hell 'cuz I came underhanded like a softball pitch covered in slimy spit
Bring your “A” game or end up a stuffed museum exhibit
I got connections at the illest Stepfather Factory ever
From here on out serving you nothing but sleep for dinner
You mad?
You better catch me in between blinks or moonwalking backwards on air with velvet slippers
I'm that fuckin' nigga
[Verse 2]
The bulletproof saint
My spinning metal halo spits titanium chromidium razor blades
In a 360-degree radius of time, energy, and space
From the twenty-eighth dimension where I contemplate over earth's dominion
You need blueprints to construct a stargate to escape the ass whipping knowing no ending
You'll be begging for any fat lady to start singing
Banished to the outer edge of infinity
Sentenced to pummel you senseless
Your guardian angels will be nowhere to be found
There’ll be no Jehovah to witness
Consult your paganistic mystic
Your daily horoscope will read absolutely horrific
Your palm reader will be like "Oh Shit!"
Here comes that new legend
That don't spit that old Aunt Jemima folklore
The galactic revolutionary
Galloping on the back of crazy horse with a blue laser to blast these big lips on Mt. Rushmore
Bringing you face to face with the newest in evolution
Welcome to the future
You've been categorized and archived with pins stuck in your abdomen like a pretty butterfly
You purple?
Step to a nigga and find out exactly what happens when doves cryYou might also likeEmbed

song.full_title: Energy Harvester (Swallow the Sun) by Bigg Jus
song.title: Energy Harvester (Swallow the Sun)
song.lyrics:
Energy Harvester (Swallow the Sun) Lyrics[Sample]
Dominion over this small, spinning fragment of solar driftwood, which by chance or design man has inherited out of the dark history of time and space. Spreading slowly from its little seed-bed in the solar system...

[Verse 1]
The energy harvester
I sip on molten lava
Skin made of solar panels
Photosynthesis be pumping chlorophyll intravenous through my incisors
My triggers are light sensitive
Skeletal flytrap Venus
Indestructible gene sequence
Defecating metallic radioactive waste
Scientists cat scan the brain's neurological state
Find it mutating in between barbaric rage and grace
Gigantor in this rapture
Walk the earth shifting tectonic plates
You land based
I originate in space
My reconnaissance vehicle orbital reentry velocity
We plunge in subsonic aerodynamically into an inverted phoenix
Craters scar the soil in the shape of a Kemetic black sphinx
Fertilizing the landscape with angelic semen
Cultivating mitochondrial thug DNA throughout the Nile valley region
Emblazoned the night sky with constellations of my achievement
So you can synchronize with Orion for intelligent reasoning
Archaeologists run Carbon-14 dating on my skeleton
Nanotechnology and wires all throughout my bone marrow
My fingertips shoot projectile arrows
Made up of psycholatic compounds imprinted with the royal bloodline of pharaohs
Forked tongues slither and check the air temperature
They fear me knowing the being supreme temple architecture is god body
Salah king
Book of TNS
The distinction between history and mythology
[Verse 2]
Elohim the component embodiment in the conscious of man
The omniscient exalted
Wisdom abundant as sand
You sacrificial sautéed lamb
Premature with a trajectory pubescent and aimless
I'm time itself
Infinite and ageless
Travel space without tools of measurement or gauges
Holographic verbal calligraphy
The voice box is a two-thousand piece symphony of waveform energy based on the spirals of Archimedes
Scholars write their thesis on its authenticity
The sacrosanct that will erase entire timelines of history
While flexing my arm
You simplistic in the use of rhyming elementary words that form
Fool I been advanced since copper alloyed with tin became the age of bronze
Since the tree of knowledge bore fruit at the age of dawn
Since winged creatures evolved flight out the primordial night
Strapped down in the cockpit with Dramamine for those with motion sickness afraid of heights
My consciousness elevate rap two-million miles above the earth
Forcing you to look out the spaceship window where you can see the curvature of its surface
Before you get dropped into a freefall to burn up in the atmosphere
The type of lyricist that mainstream corporation shareholders fear and hide they existence
While spoon-feeding you gluttonous amounts of greed lust and ignorance
The book of TNS
The forbidden word
I'm miraculous like a virgin birth
But since it's verbal death you choose I'm glad to be of assistance
Turn that weak ass back to ether in an instant
You might also like[Outro]
I beseech you
Then mark them with offenses contrary to the doctrine in which ye have learned
For I will swallow the Sun and let you freeze
The champions of this shit
Snake ass niggas that shapeshiftEmbed

song.full_title: This is Poor People's Day by Bigg Jus
song.title: This is Poor People’s Day
song.lyrics:
This is Poor People’s Day Lyrics[Bigg Jus]
This is poor people's day
Misery, conflict, and hardship
Lack of clean water with landmines
Corrupt policy makers who undervalue equity and try to steal up your resources
We on some bail out your country while privatizin' your energy reserves
While poverty is spreadin' like wildfire
You lettin' em drown in debt of compounded interest
Disease, pollution, prostitution, and child labor
Billions livin' in depression every day
While history is written by the conqueror
Expropriatin' your wealth
JP Morgan, Citi Group, and World Bank
This is poor people's day
We exercizin' our right to redistribute resources
We want self-reliance and equitable consideration
We don't need no IMF structure adjustment
Four hundred years of rape and free labor, we'll start with reparations
You want to end destabilization, stay the fuck up out our nation
Don't let this animosity build
America behind the headlines
Behind the scenes look at class warfare, inequality, and greed in a quest for globalization
Corporate subsidies settin' poor farmers back generations
Wolves takin' on sheep's clothing
We here to abolish the barriers
This is poor people's day

Poverty is a human rights violation
You ain't privatizin' nathin'
For every dollar it receives in aid, the third world spends thirteen on debt repayment
Slavery and debt  industrialized your world and civilized it
Greedy bastards
Corporate interests like to reach for they gun at any sign of dissent
You takin' liberties
We here to loosen the stranglehold and shut down production
We say the things no one else will say
We take responsibility to change the course no matter the consequences
'Cause once the word is out, the population will know your distorted views
Money and power won't insulate you in your gated communities
We hold the people in position of power accountable for they actions
'Cause when you speak to these savages you gotta speak to 'em in their own language
This is poor people's day
You might also likeMisery, genocide, imperialism is about to come to an end
When the tainted winds shift you be left smellin' your own shit
This is poor people's day

(Animosity)
(Oh yeah)
Poor people's day
(America) (Time to face the nation)
This is poor people's day
(Animosity)
(Oh yeah)
(Urban battlefields)
(Behind the scenes)
(Don't want no government corrupt me)

[?]
Do you hear what we're saying?
Do you see reality?
No more fear (no more fear) or complacency
It's the only path to freedom (to freedom)
Social and spiritual equilibrium
So act now and soon you'll change them all
Time is short, don't hesitate
Reset the index tomorrow it may be too late
Do you hear what we're saying?
Do you see what's on out minds?
It's the only way to freedom (freedom yeah)
[Bigg Jus]
Greedy bastardsEmbed

song.full_title: Orbital Mechanics by Bigg Jus (Ft. MarQ Spekt)
song.title: Orbital Mechanics
song.lyrics:
Orbital Mechanics Lyrics[Bigg Jus]
Burner verses
Strictly, strictly, strictly burner verses

We squalor dollars 'cause our industrial military complex is impoverished
So once again we recreated the monster
Feedin' it ziploc bags of oxycontin
In federally insured commodities markets
I'm out here tryin' to take back the city
Where half the population wouldn't vote for a darkie candidate if Jesus himself was door-knockin'
And some of y'all got about as much opinions as inanimate objects
The mental projection of your digital self is frigid ice-cold robotic
In the eighth circle of Dante's inferno knee-deep in excrement with goggles and scuba equipment
'Cause once we bump off the mujahideen we push back up the opium shipments
The government got a problem with authority, not me
Tryin' to move a ton of sand and reconfigure the middle east
I move through the scene an unseen traveler
Cross the suspension bridge of disbelief
With wild-ass cannibal wildebeest that feed on pro-lifers that favor the death penalty
I'm here to tell you like this: ignorance is no longer bliss
It's rancid, stale, yellow pee-pee
And you sleepwalkers steady gettin' urinated on, wake up and smell the stench
Tomorrow's events was manufactured yesterday
Which now makes you today's new slave
Dwell on that for a second
I revolve around the orbital mechanics of the twelfth planet
Light years ahead, surveyin' your fragile planet's damage
Comin' back to rescue you with these prophetic hymns
'Cause most of y'all done lost your minds hypnotized by spinning rims
Bigg Jus is back again, let the rhyme championships begin
And if this ain't dope enough for you, I've brought along a dear old friend
[sample]
What we gotta do is... we gone let everything cool down
Yo, check it out...
Yo, what's gonna happen?
I don't wanna be against you guys...
I've been around for centuries, and you don't know me yet

[Marq Spekt]
I gotta come hard, that bitch got a head of snakes
Now I'mma say spot Karl Rove behind the negligee
Fuck beef, we grindin' pepper steak
On a five-day, four-night island getaway
So I don't want none of y'all thinkin' I'm a rapper
This that silver arrow, walk like a panther
Twist that kushy sour diesel, I'm finna smoke a fire cracker
Partial birth aborted, pulled him out with a wire hanger
Leaky right? We need more retirements and dying rappers
He livin' right next door to the house of flying daggers
'Cause niggas don't aim, they just fire random
I take it all to my advantage just to gain leverage
I see your brain hemorrhage
But you know we all battlin' the same devils kid
A smear campaign like how blood paint ghettos
And niggas is jaded, some of 'em still stay mellow
This ain't my fluency, your crew and me
Bout to form our own little mutiny
Shatter, throw rocks through your windows of opportunity
Y'all better run up on Latifah, talkin' bout unity
Fuck the fingers, Spekt got a sticky hand
Turn a corner desolate hood into Disney Land
B.C. run up like "gimme that"
We bout to drop more hits, it's the gutter Terry Lewis and Jimmy Jam
Peep this international smash house
Dirty needle mark fiends is Pookie
Smokin' rocks in a glass house
Don't make me lash out
Stick the club up, everybody put they hands down
North America leave niggas trapped in freedom
Ask your people
Before they get lined up stiff as a wax museum
Niggas is illin' to act indecent
Can't tell me shit when mami wanna scratch the ceilin'
Alexander set to conquer shit
Different continents
Carbon blade camouflage Bathing Ape sponsorship
They don't wantin' it
And we the most dominant with the dirtiest flavor
You feelin' like you back up in the 36 chambers
Give me so much dap 'til I had to learn he a hater
Brush they hands off the shoulder like "you disturbin' me player"
Must not have heard we was major, he just an idiot
Brodie never level the playin' field when we blitz, it's hideous
But we got a bad rep for bein' insidious, and all my affiliates
Smack y'all niggas to death, that's how we really get
You might also like(Really get
G-Man and Lune TNS gone let them know
Keep them inside the cages
Orbital shit
Takin' all of your shit)Embed

song.title: Halogen Lanterns
song.lyrics:
Halogen Lanterns LyricsHollow earth
Eight-hundred miles below the sun
Wake up in dreamland three days later
Naked, quivering, sucking your thumb
Area Five-Thousand One behavior modification
Listening to backwards Black Sabbath albums high on secretions from puffer fish toxins
Suspended upside down in a octagonal melting hologram
'Til the psychological makeup is clear gelatin
Hallucinating with visions of caterpillars chewing away at the neurovascular veins in your limbs
We convert fake rappers into human computer interface
Old school vintage labs with neon cathode rays
Thousands of telekinetic candidates hypnotically triggered by word play who will cut your car's brake line and get Lee Harvey Oswald when I say
Killer synchronicity
Tune in to the sinister subliminal frequency
I spit plutonium doses of unscrupulous strategery
Capable of anything
Rotten apples with holes in them that don't fall far from the tree
Lord Strangelove magna cum laude
You heard of it?
High frequency active aural research
The acid lysergic
Devious experiments
Kingspitter untraceable nerve shit
Terminator commander in chief down to robotic subordinates
You are now in an altered states of consciousness
A voice imprint etched into your brain will be triggered through hypnotic suggestion
Where I'm going to play several different harmonic tones
Whenever you hear these tones you will become an indestructible army-of-one
A fearless killing machine
You will do anything that I command you to
Now pull the trigger
Kill

So many brushes with death I grew iron dreads the strength of Samson
Walking through the fog of war with a broken sword and a halogen lantern
Kicking down death's door
To find Mephistopheles masturbating John Bolton the whore
The supreme lyrical version of a Buddhist monk dowsing himself with gasoline burning
A mercenary with no mercy
Who moves from point "A" to point "B" in eerie silence murderously
Leaving nothing to the imagination
No fairy-tale endings in eternal damnation
This is Cecil B
Demille in IMAX with popcorn and soda watching the birth of a nation
Where inbred psychopaths who portray themselves as original cultivators of civilization
You're stupid
Half of man's recorded history had passed before any of you savages could read or write
The origin of your most sacred esoteric science is based upon ancient Gizan geometry
That's why the square compass in the degree of a triangle is the symbol of your most powerful society
I don't come limp-wristed
I swing for the fences
This ain't Jim Crow radio
I get that attention
Like Palestinians in Jerusalem in the summertime rocking bulky trenches
My constituency make the gun purchases go up on any given day by five-percent
'Cuz ten-percent of you are parasitic leaches
The other eighty-five the truth will frighten you to death
Gods floating in a sea of faceless faces
Who prefer to walk through life anonymous and nameless
Bound together through invisible chains
Silently whispering my name
You might also likeTo one day have the strength to play the battle out in their minds and visualize change
Where we would murder the messenger and spit upon the king's bloody grave
Nothing worthwhile ever came easy
They've feared me from the first day of history and wrote about me in the city of Ur twenty-one-hundred years before Christ AD
From the valley of dry bones to the crusades of Christianity
The Vatican Jesuits offered me a fleet of ships full of riches and my own nation
All in the name of temptation they try to tempt me
Because what I represent they cherish, fear, and envy, and at the same time hate
Praying for the day to sneak up behind and slit the throat of fate
You can't tempt fateEmbed

song.full_title: Illustrations of Hieronymus Bosch... That 1467 Shit by Bigg Jus

'Cuz most of them are way to pussy to say shit

song.title: Night Before
song.lyrics:
Night Before LyricsThe day before the revolt
The night before the uprising
In between death and rebirth
The state of revolutionary action in America
Coup d'état: a love story

You can't just crush and belittle truth
That's what happens when you start to feel immortal
The chickens come home and people feel like they need some type of vindication
To reach out and kill the harbinger of doom
In your pathological pursuit of privilege, indulgence, and hoarded wealth liberated on foreign adventures
While in the streets at night behind the walled palace you can smell the burning tension
Laughing during your inauguration day
The day they pelted your bulletproof caddies with boulders shattering the illusion
That public relations campaigns of cover-up and collusion
The Cuban detention centers
Spanning beyond race, beyond class, beyond gender
But still mostly the darker colors
That's why it took so damn long
Cultural repression is a hulking beast
Feeding on hatred so it grew up strong and stupid
Programmed by fake information
Waiting for the precise moment to rip its hook into a population and tear it to shreds
A kaleidoscope of ignorance merging into one bright beautiful red orchid on top a wood casket
Under the ongoing fabrication of threat and crisis
Over and over and over again 'till it started to wear dangerously thin
Through the widow's veil monitored through the surveillance cameras of armed drones Above non-violent king protest
Sparking police-state retribution
Now nobody's laughing
Across the line a force of military tank battalion
Made up of hillbilly psychopaths and naive soldiers
Stand in honor behind the larceny of the system
Smear campaigns and intimidation
But when they grow old and look back through these years at all the caring people who started to come up missing
The climate that bore children
A future with no vision
Until they saw it vividly clear through a barrel of a scopeYou might also likeEmbed

song.title: Eerie Silence
song.lyrics:
Eerie Silence Lyrics[sample]
Going to stand in the face of any kind of a reaction from narrow-minded people rather than compromise

[Bigg Jus]
Sleep is death, death's shrouded in silence
Cowardly individuals submit then meekly keep quiet
Rebellion a cemetery full of sleep, lifelessness
Say the wrong thing or speak out of turn you'll feel the black silencer
Listen to forget so nothing said is priceless
To your corporate controllers
Talk kills, silence is golden
So while you graciously remain silent
Yo, we silently takin' over
Remain calm and lower the volume
You're strictly prohibited from accessin' this rebel nigga album
We will instruct you on what information we want you to see or hear
Then allow you to see or hear what you want which is usually nothin'
And how the naughty stay in power
The political terminology a definition of doublespeak
Meaning: you'll be dumbfounded by the lexicon to understand anything
While freedom is stolen right in front of your face, you sleepin'
Sleep be the cousin of death, to quote Nas
I'll slang terminology, blaow, I caught you sleepin'
Sleep is when the secret patriot act gets passed
And when they havin' secret takeover meetings
We would like to thank you for your participation and allow the cycle of injustice to perpetuate
While you safely tucked away in between your pillows and sheets dreaming
So tomorrow when you wake up to the potential light of truth
You won't remember or say anything
Just an eerie, deafening silenceYou might also likeEmbed

song.lyrics:
When They Start... That 1997 Uptop Shit Lyrics[Verse 1]
I feel as though I'm ancient
Transversing through stages
Trying to grasp the gravity of life shielding you from storms facing
But being a perceptive child it’s time to knowledge truth
For you represent the base of the tree
I symbolize the root
In a world of smokescreens we impact everything
But often left powerless to control
So as you embark on your journey away remember the voyage home to your birth village
Where we long abandoned our wisdom
To navigate the treacherous path from earth ending or quell the anger and resentments toward our women
From the highest state of consciousness we fell into a diabolical game of life that's rigged from the beginning
Where few men who wanted change didn’t have the power and those who had the power to change the situation didn’t
Seeing the unseen
The story of an unknown generational being
Your pops is a production of environmental misery
Yet seeking the truth is every intelligent man's responsibility
To pass down the foundation of guidance 'cuz yours is a stolen legacy
Where we teach strength to those who lost their will
[Scratched sample]
When we start the revolution all they'll probably do is squeal
Start the revolution

Jah willing I’ll be there to consult you when you find yourself alone on the battlefield

Niggas know the deal
When we start the revolution all they'll probably do is squeal

How do I begin this history lesson
How do I teach my seed the government considers him opposition
Targeted with entrapment for slave labor in a prison
If they consider him a threat Lord knows they try to kill him
But he must know about Tuskegee syphilis injections and how scientists turn vaccine into bio-weapons
I'm out here trying to make sense of the time
When you much too young to know the definition of genocide or how they lied about thirty million people on the continent of Africa getting aids from a monkey bite
We dealing with statistics the size of the entire US black population
Every man woman and child killed

[Scratched sample]
When we start the revolution all they'll probably do is squeal
Start the revolution

They sleepwalking
We call 'em sleepwalkers

[Verse 3]
The greatest killing machine ever of all time was a silent weapon
When it was applied gradually people learned to tolerate and adjust to its presence

But understand this:
Jah makes no perfect weapons
You will no longer be able to control us through suppression
The poor are getting hungry and our ribs are showing
What was seemingly impossible to move mountains is now possible to remove mountains with high explosives
